title: OpenPrintTag JSON representation
description: Decoded JSON/YAML representation of the binary data stored on an OpenPrintTag

data.description: Decoded data on regions of the tag

unknown_fields.description: Fields that are not in the specification - specification mandates to preserve them. Kept as a key-value binary hex strings.

^([0-9a-f]{2})+$.description: Both key and value are raw CBOR data (of the respective CBOR map key and value) encoded as a hex string.
